text:
="preserve">Douglas Jack Wiseman (July 21, 1930 – August 1, 2020) was a Canadian politician and businessman. He was in the Legislative Assembly of Ontario as a Progressive Conservative from 1971 to 1990, and was a cabinet minister in the government of Bill Davis. He was born in Smiths Falls, Ontario.
Wiseman died on August 1, 2020 at a hospital in Perth, Ontario at the age of 90.
